span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类对象提供容器的字段的。This class object provides the container for the fields of an . 访问的属性检索对象。Accessing the property of an retrieves an object. 属性和方法类是的一个超集接口。The properties and methods of the class are a superset of the interface. 所有属性和方法，该接口，包括那些继承自 ASP.NET 的接口中，此都适用。All properties and methods of that interface, including those that it inherits from the ASP.NET interface, are applicable here. 此类提供其他属性和方法来修改该集合。This class provides additional properties and methods to modify the collection. 这些属性和方法提供的标准集合管理功能，例如添加、 删除，以及清除集合。These properties and methods provide standard collection management capability, such as adding, removing, and clearing the collection. 如果通过调用的方法更改的集合， ， ，或Page_Init 的视图状态期间， ，和对象列表的属性将被忽略.If you change the collection by calling the methods , , , or during Page_Init, the view state for the , , and properties of the object list is ignored.

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是处于只读模式可用接口。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 将字段添加到该控件的对象列表更改数据绑定行为的字段集合，并要求你再次将数据绑定到控件。Adding a field to the field collection of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是处于只读模式可用接口。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 可以使用应用此方法的所有类的方法。You can use the method for all the classes where this method applies. 例如，方法集合中清除所有的样式在集合; 或者对于，它会清除集合中的所有选项。For example, the method for a collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the , it clears all the choices in the collection. 将字段添加到该控件的对象列表更改数据绑定行为的字段，并要求你再次将数据绑定到控件。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此方法的第二个版本中，它将搜索的字段属性`fieldId`，并返回第一个匹配字段。In the second version of this method, it searches for a field with the property `fieldId` and returns the first matching field. 如果不找到任何匹配项，则它将搜索的字段属性的`fieldID`参数并返回第一个匹配字段。If no match is found, it searches for a field with the property's `fieldID` parameter and returns the first matching field. 否则，则返回-1。Otherwise, it returns -1.
